entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning then changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
